chapter.title: Package Documentation
chapter.para: This chapter provides low level details on the various packages used in MailStop. The semantics and usage of each package is discussed.

section.title: Package Editors
section.para: This package is just a container for all editor related code. MailStop contains a number of editors. For example, mail message text can be edited with a general purpose text editor. In addition, however, MailStop also provides specialized mini-editors for editing message headers, encoded text, and other things. All the code, both low and high level, supporting MailStop's editors is contained in the Editors hierarchy.
